授業方法:
【連絡事項】
9月22日㈬から対面授業となります。
オンライン受講生を申請された学生はオンデマンドにて下記URLを押下してください。
https://kwanseio365-my.sharepoint.com/:w:/g/personal/brz88532_nuc_kwansei_ac_jp/EU0yF4bY7-1CkpSwN1nF380Bj74dw1WP92ZB0DRZmZLLoA?e=JXtpwq
9月29日からのオンデマンドはLUNAにて確認してください。

Class will be face to face style.
Students who are approved for online study should check LUNA for on demand lessons.
Students who are approved for online study should complete the attached URL lesson below.

https://kwanseio365-my.sharepoint.com/:w:/g/personal/brz88532_nuc_kwansei_ac_jp/EU0yF4bY7-1CkpSwN1nF380Bj74dw1WP92ZB0DRZmZLLoA?e=JXtpwq

第1回: Welcome back, course outline, summer interview chart, short individual speeches about your holiday
第2回: Text " Health"   physical and mental variables, pair work gap exercise, habits and routines
第3回: Text "Health" continued, pair work "who, when, what, how" questions and answers, dialog construction and presentation
第4回: Text "Fashion"   the economics of fashion, choose the correct vocabulary drills, comparative adjectives
第5回: Text "Fashion" continued, making probable prediction, expressing opinions, dialog construction of today's fashion trends
第6回: "The Global Market"  news article and explanation, individual presentations first draft
第7回: Individual presentations and feedback, group activity: What is Japan famous for?
第8回: Text "Bushido"   reading comprehension questions, vocabulary matching, pair work gap exercise
第9回: Text "Bushido" continued, western historical perspective, discussion questions
第10回: Text  "Galapagos Islands"   be like and look like exercise, asking indirect questions
第11回: Text  "Galapagos Islands" continued, grammar drills, making a detailed itinerary
第12回: Text  "Travel"   pair work gap exercise, listening comprehension drills, small group work interview chart
第13回: Course review, exam explanation, language game
トピック.授業外学習2: Students would be advised to do as much personal study outside the classroom as possible.  Also, to submit any homework assignments on time.

評価.教科書Required texts0: "Think About It" Joe M Jacobs Marathon Publishing
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
評価.備考Note0: Students will be expected to be attentive and engaged in classroom activities.
